description: Search through a collection with a query. The output is an array of objects with the following fields: idx, text and score, make add these fields to your schema model.
label: Collection Search

options.info: The output format of the output data. Can be used in later steps to select the properties of this data. Should contain the following fields: idx, text and score
options.name: schemaModel
options.label: Schema Model

options.info: The threshold of the prefilter. The prefilter will only return results with a score higher than this threshold. Leaving this on the default value of 0.0 should be fine in most cases.
options.name: threshold
options.label: Prefilter Threshold

options.info: Choose a name for the variable that will store the array
options.name: result
options.label: Result
